int main(){
	int a = 1;
	int b = 2;
	int c = 0;

	c = a + b;

	if (c > 1){
		c = 10;
	}
	else{
		c = 100;
	}
}

LOAD R0 14
LOAD R1 15
ADD R2 R0 R1
STORE 16 R2
LOAD R3 17
SUB R3 R2 R3
BNEG 11
BZERO 11
LOAD R3 18
STORE 16 R3
BRANCH 13
LOAD R3 19
STORE 16 R3
HALT
1
2
0
1
10
100
0
